cgcloud__Org_Unit_User__c.name: cgcloud__Org_Unit_User__c
cgcloud__Org_Unit_User__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between the organization unit and the user.

cgcloud__Org_Unit__c.description: Reference to an org unit that's assigned to a user.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Hyperlink to the detail page of the record.

cgcloud__User__c.description: Reference to a user who is assigned to an org unit.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the entry is valid.
